page.title: 09SPORT CENTRE INTERVIEW.
page.content: {5,HOW MUCH DID IT COST TO BUILD ? IT COST A HUNDRED AND TEN THOUSAND POUNDS. {6,WHO OFFICALLY OPENED THE CENTRE ? COUNCILLOR HART OPENED IT. {7,WHAT DATE ? IN JUNE 1974 {8,ROUGHLY HOW MANY PEOPLE PER WEEK USE {THE SPORTS CENTRE'S FACILITIES ? PER YEAR:ONE HUNDRED AND SIXTY THOUSAND.PER WEEK THREE THOUSAND FIVE HUNDRED. {9,WHAT TIME DOES THE SPORT CENTRE {OPEN? IT OPENS AT NINE O'CLOCK IN THE MORNING. {10,WHAT TIME DOES IT CLOSE ? IT CLOSES AT TEN THIRTY IN THE EVENING AND ALL ACTIVITIES END THEN. {11,HOW MUCH DOES IT COST TO HEAT PER {YEAR ? IT COSTS,FOR GAS:SIX THOUSAND AND
